>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1/accounts/{accountId}/usage"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



API which can be used to fetch usage and billing-related information for Automation service

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"accountId","in":"path","description":"Account id","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","example":"test_account_id"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"List of supported functions.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","required":["accountId"],"properties":{"accountId":{"type":"string","description":"8x8 AccountId."}},"title":"usage"}},"examples":{"usage":{"value":{"allowedWorkflowCount":50000,"allowedOverage":true,"overagePrice":0.005,"executedWorkflowCount":1200,"countStartedMonth":7,"countStartedYear":2022}}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
